alert.note: Alert for Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SCHUYLKILL COUNTY THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Schuylkill Haven, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Pottsville, Tamaqua, Schuylkill Haven, Minersville, St. Clair, Orwigsburg, Port Carbon, Tuscarora, and Auburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central Pennsylvania.
